title: How to publish my book as an e-book on Kindle as well as publish a copy on demand - Quora

response.answer_text: You can self-publish a book through Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP). With the help of KDP, you can publish your book in just a few clicks. All you need is to have your book file ready. Amazon takes care of printing and listing it on Amazon and Kindle store. You get a royalty of up to 60% for every book you publish. I have explained in a guide on how to set up a KDP account and publish a book straight away and even get paid for it.
